  • public class MyJoystick
extends edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Joystick
    Adds functions to assist in joystick use

    Trevor

      • update

        public void update()

      • getRTheta

        public double[] getRTheta()
        Gives the location of the joystick in the coordinate system (r, theta) where r is the distance from the center and theta is the angle the joystick is pointing in radians
        Returns:
        magnitude and angle of joystick

      • getButton

        public boolean getButton(int button)
        Gives button value at given id
        Parameters:
        button - the button number on the controller. Use joy.cpl to determine physical button id's
        Returns:
        button true if button has been pressed once, accounts for debounce
